articles.description: Xiaomi has recently launched its entertainment set-top-box – the Mi Box 4K in India. It poses stiff competition to the Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K. Here’s a comparison between the two.

articles.author: Prakhar Khanna
articles.title: Dell Latitude 9510 2-in-1 with up to 34 hours of battery life launched in India - Pocketnow
articles.description: The Dell Latitude 9510 price in India starts at Rs 1,49,000. Since this is a business-centric laptop, it doesn't have pre-set configurations on sale.
articles.content: Dell Latitude 9510 2-in-1 premium commercial PC has been launched in India. It comes with Intel Core vPro processor, built-in AI, 5G-ready design, and more. The device features a 15-inch Full HD touc… [+1232 chars]

articles.author: Fabienne Lang
articles.title: Apple Awards Hacker $100,000 for Discovering 'Sign in with Apple' Vulnerability - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Apple has awarded $100,000 to a hacker for having uncovered a serious security flaw in its 'Sign in with Apple' option.
articles.content: Apple's useful Sign in with Apple option that was disclosed in June 2019 received a fair bit of positive attention, and for good reason: it replaces social logins with a secure authentication system.… [+2036 chars]
